The client/Server structure

This game is client/server oriented.

This means that at least 2 application are made. The client is the game, to be able to be played, it must be connected to a server.

The server can be private or public. If you made a private server, no one can be connected from the internet (the server.list does not contain the name of your server). A public server allows anyone to connect to.
